thread.title: Oscar Pistorius must not be granted parole, panel rules
thread.title_full: Oscar Pistorius must not be granted parole, panel rules

title: Oscar Pistorius must not be granted parole, panel rules
text: Oscar Pistorius must not be granted parole, panel rules Thursday, 8 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) 8 Oct 2015In South Africa, a panel has ruled that paralympian Oscar Pistorius must not be granted parole and instead faces an appeal for longer jail sentence.Pistorius was sentenced to 5 years in prison for killing his girlfriend.
